articles.author: Kevin Breuninger, Spencer Kimball
articles.title: Supreme Court blocks Biden Covid vaccine mandate for businesses, allows health-care worker rule - CNBC
articles.description: The Supreme Court ruled against the Biden administration's rule for OSHA, saying it did not have the power to require vaccination for millions of Americans.
articles.content: The Supreme Court on Thursday blocked the Biden administration from enforcing its sweeping vaccine-or-test requirements for large private companies, but allowed a vaccine mandate to stand for medical… [+5228 chars]

articles.author: Scott Wooldridge
articles.title: Cost of premiums, deductibles are an increasing burden on working Americans - BenefitsPro
articles.description: In 2020, health insurance premiums and deductibles ate up 11.6% of Americans' incomes.
articles.content:
Spending per person in employer plans grew by nearly 22% over the period 2015 to 2019, outpacing both inflation and economic growth.
